gpt_comment: ⚠️[DIVERGENT] The forecasts are somewhat discordant. Meteoblue predicts a temperature range of 7–11°C, which is noticeably warmer than the baseline's 6-9°C. Without explicit data from other sources, it's hard to make a definitive call, but it seems like you might want to dress a bit warmer than the baseline suggests.
